title: ZIM vs SL 1st ODI  Cricket Match Scorecard, Sri Lanka tour of Zimbabwe 2025
description: ZIM vs SL 1st ODI  Cricket Match Scorecard: Get updated Zimbabwe vs Sri Lanka 1st ODI  scorecard of Sri Lanka tour of Zimbabwe Series 2025, playing XI, venue details, toss update, and much more only at Business Standard
content:
PCB: IND vs PAK bilateral series talks only on equal footing going forward Although both nations have rich cricketing legacies, off-field issues have kept their teams apart outside of neutral-venue competitions.

Dream11 steps back as Team India's lead sponsor after new gaming bill "BCCI is also evaluating Dream11 as advertiser, as the Bill also bans advertisement of real-money games," said another source

Plan was going for week: Pujara explains decision behind retirement Pujara, 37, revealed that his retirement wasn't a sudden decision. Instead, it was a week-long process of contemplation and discussion with family members and senior players.

India A Women fall to Australia A Women by six wicket in one-off Test Edgar (5/57) claimed the scalp of VJ Joshitha in the second over of the day to get her fifer as India A folded for 286 in their second innings, setting the hosts a 281-run target.

Pujara, who played 103 Tests and scored 7195 runs at an average of 43.60, announced his retirement from all forms of cricket, drawing curtains on a career that epitomised resilience.

Former India captain Sourav Ganguly was on Sunday named head coach of SA20 team Pretoria Capitals ahead of the 2026 season in what will be his first stint at the helm of affairs of a side.

Afghanistan to host Bangladesh for 3 T20Is and 3 ODIs in October at UAE The Afghanistan Cricket Board confirmed that it will host Bangladesh in the UAE for a six-match white-ball series

Launching his ton in just 47 deliveries during the third ODI against South Africa in Mackay, Green's fury included six fours and eight sixes, propelling him into the record books.
summary: Former Indian cricketer, Rajan Pujara, has announced his retirement from all forms of the game and announced it after a week of discussion with family and senior players. The announcement comes as Dream11 steps down as Team India's lead sponsor after a new gaming bill bans the advertising of real-money games. Former India captain Sourav Ganguly has been named head coach of the SA20 team Pretoria Capitals ahead of the 2026 season. Afghanistan will host Bangladesh in the UAE for a six-match white-ball series.
shortSummary: Despite his retirement from cricket, Pujara remains a notable figure in Indian and Pakistani cricket, with upcoming series talks focusing on equal footing and real-time cricketing activities.
argos_summary: India and Pakistan are preparing to resume bilateral series on equal footing, while Dream11 steps back as India's lead sponsor due to a new gaming bill. Veteran batsman Pujara has announced his retirement after 103 Tests, and former captain Sourav Ganguly has been appointed head coach of the Pretoria Capitals for the 2026 SA20 season. In women's cricket, India A Women were defeated by Australia A Women in a one‑off Test, and Afghanistan will host Bangladesh in the UAE for a six‑match white‑ball series. Additionally, Green scored a rapid century in the third ODI against South Africa.
